description: The %s (seial number: %s) status has changed to %s. Previous status was %s.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD DELLPV132T-MIB::pV132TAgentStatusChange DELLPV132T-MIB::pV132TDisplayName s EXAMPLE DELLPV132T-MIB::moverSerNum s EXAMPLE DELLPV132T-MIB::pV132TGlobalStatus i 1 DELLPV132T-MIB::pV132TLastGlobalStatus i 1

description: Name of this agent for display purposes.
variables.name: DELLPV132T-MIB::pV132TDisplayName

description: Device serial number as reported in SCSI Inquiry command, page 0x80.
variables.name: DELLPV132T-MIB::moverSerNum

description: Current status of the agent for this server.
This is a rollup for the entire agent including any
monitored devices. The status is intended to give
initiative to a snmp monitor to get further data when
this status is abnormal.
variables.name: DELLPV132T-MIB::pV132TGlobalStatus

description: The status before the current status which induced an initiative
to issue a global status change trap.
variables.name: DELLPV132T-MIB::pV132TLastGlobalStatus

description: The %s (seial number: %s) door state has changed to %s.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD DELLPV132T-MIB::pV132TDoorStateChange DELLPV132T-MIB::pV132TDisplayName s EXAMPLE DELLPV132T-MIB::moverSerNum s EXAMPLE DELLPV132T-MIB::moverDoorState i 1

description: Name of this agent for display purposes.

description: Device serial number as reported in SCSI Inquiry command, page 0x80.
variables.name: DELLPV132T-MIB::moverSerNum

description: Door State of the device. The interpretation of this value is vendor specific.
variables.name: DELLPV132T-MIB::moverDoorState

description: The %s (seial number: %s) mailbox state has changed to %s.

description: The %s (seial number: %s) device has powered up. Previous shutdown state was %s.
